stepTitle: Silicon nitride is a very hard, high-temperature-resistant ceramic used as a component of turbine blades in jet engines. It is prepared according to the following equation: 3\text{Si}(s) + 2\text{N}_2(g) \rightarrow \text{Si}_3\text{N}_4(s). Which is the limiting Reactant when $$2.00$$ g of Si and $$1.50$$ g of $$N_2$$ react?
